Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc42
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes

Class ChatView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc42.view.Classes.ChatView
public class ChatView extends Object
Implementation of the Chat for the GUI. This Class contains everything needed to build the Chat, plus everything needed to make it work.

  • Constructor Details

    • ChatView

      public ChatView(boolean hasBackground, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane container, javafx.scene.layout.StackPane contentContainer, javafx.scene.control.TextField chatTextField, javafx.scene.control.Button sendButton, javafx.scene.text.Text chatHint, ViewController controller)
      Constructor Method.
      Parameters:
      hasBackground - : a boolean value that specifies if the Chat has a background or not, used to adjust some colors.
      container - : the StackPane that will contain the Chat, used to animate the show/hide behavior.
      contentContainer - : the StackPane that will contain the Messages, used to give updates in real time.
      chatTextField - : The TextField where it will read the User's Messages.
      sendButton - : The Button that registers the User's "Send" click.
      chatHint - : The Text that contains the "Show/Hide" hint, that will updated during the Show/Hide behavior.
      controller - : The main GUI Controller that needs to be accessed for input-blocking etc.

  • Method Details

    • isShowing

      public boolean isShowing()
      Getter Method for isShowing.
      Returns:
      a boolean value indicating if the Chat is currently shown or hidden.

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getPane()
      Getter Method for container.
      Returns:
      the StackPane that contains the whole Chat.
